sqlfile.sql: select to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') dqrq from dual where 1=?
SELECT to_char(SYSDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss') AS sj FROM dual where 1=?
select PKG_PUB_FUN.FUN_GET_GUID uuid from dual
select a.swjgdm id,a.swjgmc text from A_LS_comm_swjglb a where 1=? order by a.xh

sql.describ: 根据机关查询职能范围

sqlfile.sql: select a.znjgfw znfw from DM_QX_SWJG_WJDS a where a.swjg_dm = ?

sql.describ: 根据身份查询职能范围

sqlfile.sql: select a.znjgfw znfw from dm_qx_swjg_wjds a, dm_qx_swrysf b where b.swrysf_dm = ? and a.swjg_dm = b.sfswjg_dm

sql.describ: 根据当前登陆的身份查询对应的机关下拉列表

sqlfile.sql: SELECT T.Swjg_Dm SWJGDM, t.swjgmc SWJGMC FROM DM_GY_SWJG T START WITH T.SWJG_DM = (select a.sfswjg_dm from DM_QX_SWRYSF a where a.swrysf_dm = ?) CONNECT BY PRIOR T.SWJG_DM = T.SJSWJG_DM and t.swjgbz = '0' and t.zn_dm = '01'

sql.describ: 根据纳税人识别号或社会信用代码及操作人身份查询企业列表

sqlfile.sql: select to_char(a.djxh) djxh, a.zgswskfj_dm zgswskfjdm, b.swjgmc zgswskfjmc, a.nsrmc, a.nsrsbh, a.shxydm, a.fddbrxm, a.fddbrsfzjhm, a.zzjg_dm zzjgdm, c.nsrztmc, d.kzztdjlxmc, (case when a.kqccsztdjbz = 'Y' then '是' when a.kqccsztdjbz = 'N' then '否' else '' end) kqccsztdjbz, a.scjydz, a.zcdz from dj_nsrxx a, DM_GY_SWJG b, DM_GY_nsrzt c, dm_dj_kzztdjlx d where (a.nsrsbh = ? or a.shxydm = ?) and a.zgswskfj_dm = b.swjg_dm(+) and a.nsrzt_dm = c.nsrzt_dm(+) and a.kzztdjlx_dm = d.kzztdjlx_dm(+) and a.nsrzt_dm not in ('07', '08', '10') and a.zgswskfj_dm like (select x.znjgfw || '%' from DM_QX_SWJG_WJDS x, dm_qx_swrysf y where y.swrysf_dm = ? and y.sfswjg_dm = x.swjg_dm) order by a.zgswj_dm, a.zgswskfj_dm, a.nsrmc

sql.describ: 根据企业登记序号查询联系人列表

sqlfile.sql: select distinct b.swry_dm id, b.swryxm text from DM_QX_SWRYSF a, dm_gy_swry b where a.swry_dm = b.swry_dm and a.yxbz = 'Y' and b.yxbz = 'Y' and a.sfswjg_dm in (SELECT T.Swjg_Dm FROM DM_GY_SWJG T START WITH T.SWJG_DM IN (select n.zgswskfj_dm from dj_nsrxx n where n.djxh = ?) CONNECT BY PRIOR T.SWJG_DM = T.SJSWJG_DM and t.zn_dm = '01')

sql.describ: 根据业务表序号查询对应企业的基本信息

sqlfile.sql: select to_char(a.djxh) djxh, a.zgswskfj_dm zgswskfjdm, b.swjgmc zgswskfjmc, a.nsrmc, a.nsrsbh, a.shxydm, a.fddbrxm, a.fddbrsfzjhm, a.zzjg_dm zzjgdm, c.nsrztmc, d.kzztdjlxmc, (case when a.kqccsztdjbz = 'Y' then '是' when a.kqccsztdjbz = 'N' then '否' else '' end) kqccsztdjbz, a.scjydz, a.zcdz, e.ssgly_dm lxrdm from dj_nsrxx a, DM_GY_SWJG b, DM_GY_nsrzt c, dm_dj_kzztdjlx d, A_GY_NSRXX_SWRY_DZ e where e.xh = ? and a.djxh = e.djxh and a.zgswskfj_dm = b.swjg_dm(+) and a.nsrzt_dm = c.nsrzt_dm(+) and a.kzztdjlx_dm = d.kzztdjlx_dm(+)

select a.djxh, b.nsrsbh, b.shxydm, b.nsrmc, a.bj, case when a.bj = '0' then '失败' when a.bj = '1' then '成功' else '未知' end bjmc, c.swryxm, case when a.bj = '1' then '成功' else a.message end message from A_LS_FZ001_UPLOADLB a, dj_nsrxx b, dm_gy_swry c where a.djxh = b.djxh(+) and a.lxrdm = c.swry_dm(+) and 1 = ? order by a.bj, a.message, a.djxh

sql.describ: 根据上级机关查询下级机关及本级机关人员

sqlfile.sql: select id, text, state, lx from (SELECT a.swjg_dm id, a.swjgmc text, 'closed' state, '1' lx FROM DM_GY_SWJG a where a.xybz = 'Y' and a.yxbz = 'Y' and a.sjswjg_dm = ? union select distinct b.swry_dm id, b.swryxm text, '' state, '2' lx from DM_QX_SWRYSF a, dm_gy_swry b where a.swry_dm = b.swry_dm and a.sfswjg_dm = ?) order by lx, id
select a.jbsjly_dm dm, a.jbsjly_mc mc from A_DM_xt_JBSJLY a where a.yxbj=? order by a.jbsjly_dm
select a.jbqsks_dm dm, a.jbqsks_mc mc from a_dm_xt_jbqsks a where a.yxbj=? order by a.jbqsks_dm

sql.describ: 根据主键查询模板基础信息

sqlfile.sql: select a.jbsjly_dm, a.jbqsks_dm, a.table_name_en, a.table_name_zw, a.sm from a_cj_ksmb a where a.uuid = ?

sql.describ: 根据主键查询模板字段列表

sqlfile.sql: select a.uuid, a.mxxh, a.zd_name_en, a.zd_name_zw zd_name_zw_xgq, a.zd_name_zw zd_name_zw_xgh, a.zd_length zd_length_xgh, a.zd_length zd_length_xgq from a_cj_ksmb_zd a where a.uuid = ? order by a.mxxh

sql.describ: 根据操作人代码取所属机关信息

sqlfile.sql: select a.sfswjg_dm swjgdm, b.swjgmc from DM_QX_SWRYSF a, dm_gy_swjg b where a.swrysf_dm = ? and a.sfswjg_dm = b.swjg_dm
select a.xybj_dm dm,a.xybj_mc mc from a_dm_gy_xybj a where a.yxbj = ? order by a.xybj_dm desc
select a.jbqsks_dm id, a.jbqsks_mc text, 'closed' state, '1' lx from a_dm_xt_jbqsks a where a.yxbj = ? order by a.jbqsks_dm

sql.describ: 根据科室代码查询模板列表

sqlfile.sql: select a.uuid id, a.table_name_zw text, '' state, '2' lx from a_cj_ksmb a where a.jbqsks_dm = ? and a.yxbj = 'Y' order by a.table_name_zw

sql.describ: 查询发起阶段应对人员的岗位代码

sqlfile.sql: select a.gw_dm from a_xt_swjg_gzl_gw_dzb a where a.swjg_dm = ? and a.lcdy_id = ? and a.yxbj = 'Y'

sql.describ: 根据身份查询平级机关列表

sqlfile.sql: select t.swjg_dm id, t.swjgmc text, 'closed' state, '1' lx from Dm_Gy_Swjg t where t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.yxbz = 'Y' and exists (select n_jg.sjswjg_dm from dm_qx_swrysf sf, Dm_Gy_Swjg n_jg where sf.swrysf_dm = ? and sf.sfswjg_dm = n_jg.swjg_dm and t.sjswjg_dm = n_jg.sjswjg_dm)

sql.describ: 根据上级机关代码、岗位代码查询下级机关及个人

sqlfile.sql: select id, text, state, lx, ssswjgdm from (SELECT a.swjg_dm id, a.swjgmc text, 'closed' state, '1' lx, '' ssswjgdm FROM DM_GY_SWJG a where a.xybz = 'Y' and a.yxbz = 'Y' and a.sjswjg_dm = ? union select distinct b.swry_dm id, b.swryxm text, '' state, '2' lx, a.SFSWJG_DM ssswjgdm from DM_QX_SWRYSF a, dm_gy_swry b, QX_JGGW_SWRYSF c, QX_SWJG_GW d where a.swry_dm = b.swry_dm and a.sfswjg_dm = ? and a.swrysf_dm = c.swrysf_dm and c.yxbz = 'Y' and c.gwxh = d.gwxh) order by lx, id

sql.describ: 根据流程实例号查询子任务主键

sqlfile.sql: select a.uuid,a.mxxh,a.zt_dm,a.ydsm from a_Cj_Zdyrwsl_Mx a where a.lcslh = ?

sql.describ: 根据主键查询主任务基本信息

sqlfile.sql: select b.swjgmc fqbmmc, c.uuid tbbuuid, c.table_name_zw tbbbm, a.tbwcxdts, a.sfsh_dm, a.sm from a_cj_zdyrwsl a, dm_gy_swjg b, a_cj_ksmb c where a.uuid = ? and a.lrjg_dm = b.swjg_dm and a.mblb = c.uuid
select a.table_name_zw,a.table_name_en from a_cj_ksmb a where a.uuid = ?

select a.column_name zdywm, b.comments zdzwm, a.data_type zclx, to_char(a.data_length) zdcd, case when a.nullable = 'N' then '否' else '是' end sfwk from dba_tab_cols a, dba_col_comments b where a.table_name = ? and a.owner = 'DB_SJFZ' and a.owner = b.owner and a.table_name = b.table_name and a.column_name = b.column_name and a.column_name not in ('UUID', 'UUID_XH', 'LRRY_DM', 'LRSJ', 'XGSJ') order by a.segment_column_id
update a_cj_zdyrwsl a set a.xgry_dm=? ,a.xg_sj=sysdate,a.sfsh_dm=?,a.tbwcxdts=?,a.sm=? where a.uuid=?
update a_cj_zdyrwsl_mx a set a.xgry_dm = ? ,a.xg_sj=sysdate,a.ydsm=? where a.uuid = ? and a.mxxh = ?
select a.uuid,a.mblb,a.sfsh_dm,a.tbwcxdts,a.sm,a.zt_dm from a_cj_zdyrwsl a where a.lcslh=?

sql.describ: 主任务查询子任务列表信息

sqlfile.sql: select a.uuid, a.mxxh, a.lcslh, a.zt_dm ztdm, b.zt_mc ztmc, a.ydr_dm ydrdm, c.swryxm ydrxm from a_cj_zdyrwsl_mx a, a_dm_sjfz_cj_zt b, dm_gy_swry c where a.uuid = ? and a.zt_dm = b.zt_dm and a.ydr_dm = c.swry_dm(+) order by a.mxxh

sql.describ: 根据主任务主键查询模板表名

sqlfile.sql: select a.table_name_en, a.table_name_zw,a.uuid from a_cj_ksmb a, a_cj_zdyrwsl b where a.uuid = b.mblb and b.uuid = ?

sql.describ: 判断主任务是否已归集

sqlfile.sql: select count(1) as gs from a_cj_zdyrwsl a where a.uuid = ? and a.zt_dm = '04'

sql.describ: 主任务判断子任务是否已完成

sqlfile.sql: select count(1) as gs from a_cj_zdyrwsl_mx a where a.uuid=? and a.zt_dm <> ?

sql.describ: 判断子任务是否已审核

sqlfile.sql: select count(1) as gs from a_cj_zdyrwsl_mx a where a.uuid=? and a.mxxh=? and a.zt_dm='03'

sql.describ: 根据主键查询数据库表

sqlfile.sql: select b.table_name_en sjkb from a_cj_zdyrwsl a,a_cj_ksmb b where a.uuid = ? and a.mblb = b.uuid

sql.describ: 根据当前登陆的身份查询对应的评估机关下拉列表

sqlfile.sql: SELECT K.SWJG_DM, K.SWJGMC FROM DM_QX_ZNJGDZBKZ_PGJG A, DM_GY_SWJG K WHERE A.PGJG_DM = K.SWJG_DM AND A.GLJG_DM IN ((SELECT T.SWJG_DM FROM DM_GY_SWJG T START WITH T.SWJG_DM IN (SELECT JGR.SJSWJG_DM FROM DM_QX_SWRYSF A, DM_GY_SWJG JGR WHERE A.SWRYSF_DM = ? AND A.SFSWJG_DM = JGR.SWJG_DM) CONNECT BY PRIOR T.SWJG_DM = T.SJSWJG_DM AND T.SWJGBZ = '0' AND T.ZN_DM IN ('01', '11')))
SELECT A.XYBJ_DM,A.XYBJ_MC FROM A_DM_GY_XYBJ A
SELECT A.ZSXM_DM, A.ZSXMMC FROM DM_GY_ZSXM A ORDER BY A.ZSXM_DM
SELECT A.ZSPM_DM id, A.ZSPMMC text FROM DM_GY_ZSPM A WHERE A.ZSXM_DM = ?
SELECT A.YCXSYXZ_DM, A.YCXSYXZ_MC FROM A_DM_GC_YCXSYXZ A
SELECT * FROM A_GC_YCXSYDY A WHERE A.SBXXUUID = ?
select sbxx.jsyj jsyj from sb_sbxx sbxx WHERE sbxx.sbxxuuid = ?

select hc, nsrsbh, nsrmc, swjgmc, hymc, zsxmmc, zspmmc, jsyj, ysbqy, sbfsmc, to_char(skssqq, 'yyyy-mm-dd') skssqq, to_char(skssqz, 'yyyy-mm-dd') skssqz, sbxxuuid, sbuuid, to_char(djxh) djxh, to_char(pzxh) pzxh, to_char(pzmxxh) pzmxxh, to_char(nssbrq, 'yyyy-mm-dd') nssbrq, zgswskfj_dm, zsxm_dm, zspm_dm, ycxssje, ycxsyxz_dm, ycxsyxz_mc from a_ls_fz003_query where 1 = ? order by hc
select PKG_PUB_FUN.FUN_GET_GUID AS UUID from dual where 1=?

sql.describ: 根据纳税人识别码（或社会统一信用代码）、登记序号、纳税人名称取其他信息

sqlfile.sql: select nvl(t.shxydm,t.nsrsbh) nsrsbh, t.djxh, t.nsrmc, t.fddbrxm, t.fddbrsfzjhm , t.zcdz from dj_nsrxx t where (t.shxydm=? or t.nsrsbh=?) and t.yxbz ='Y' and t.zgswskfj_dm like ?

sql.describ: 根据当前登陆的身份查询对应的机关下拉列表

sqlfile.sql: SELECT T.Swjg_Dm SWJGDM, t.swjgmc SWJGMC FROM DM_GY_SWJG T START WITH T.SWJG_DM = (select a.sfswjg_dm from DM_QX_SWRYSF a where a.swrysf_dm = ?) CONNECT BY PRIOR T.SWJG_DM = T.SJSWJG_DM and t.swjgbz = '0' and t.zn_dm = '01'

sql.describ: 根据纳税人识别码（或社会统一信用代码）、登记序号、纳税人名称取其他信息

sqlfile.sql: select nvl(t.shxydm,t.nsrsbh) nsrsbh, t.djxh, t.nsrmc, t.fddbrxm, t.fddbrsfzjhm , t.zcdz from dj_nsrxx t where (t.shxydm=? or t.nsrsbh=?) and t.yxbz ='Y' and t.zgswskfj_dm like ?
select LCSLH from A_FG_ZDFXYDSDHC WHERE DJXH=?

sql.describ: 根据流程实例号更新数据

sqlfile.sql: update A_FG_ZDFXYDSDHC set djxh =?,ajzjzl =?,nbjtsybg =?,nclcfyj =?,qtxx =? where lcslh =?

select a.xh, B.SWJGMC tbjg,a.tbzt_dm ztdm, (case when a.tbzt_dm='1' then '已锁定' when a.tbzt_dm='0' then '未锁定' end) ztmc, C.SWRYXM tbr, A.jsly jsly,to_char(a.lr_sj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') tbsj from A_GC_SSYC a, DM_GY_SWJG B, DM_GY_SWry C where A.TBSWJG_DM=B.SWJG_DM AND C.SWRY_DM=A.TBR_DM and a.tbswjg_dm like ? and trunc(a.lr_sj) >=to_date( ? ,'yyyy-mm-dd') and trunc(a.lr_sj) <=to_date( ? ,'yyyy-mm-dd') order by a.tbswjg_dm,a.lr_sj

select a.xh, B.SWJGMC tbjg,a.tbzt_dm ztdm, (case when a.tbzt_dm='1' then '已锁定' when a.tbzt_dm='0' then '未锁定' end) ztmc, C.SWRYXM tbr, A.jsly jsly,to_char(a.lr_sj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') tbsj from A_GC_SSYC a, DM_GY_SWJG B, DM_GY_SWry C where A.TBSWJG_DM=B.SWJG_DM AND C.SWRY_DM=A.TBR_DM and trunc(a.lr_sj) >=to_date( ? ,'yyyy-mm-dd') and trunc(a.lr_sj) <=to_date( ? ,'yyyy-mm-dd') order by a.tbswjg_dm,a.lr_sj
SELECT * FROM A_GC_SSYC_ZB A WHERE A.XMXH = ?

select a.xh, B.SWJGMC tbjg, a.tbzt_dm zt, z.swryxm tbr, A.JSSQSM jssqsm from A_GC_SSYC a, DM_GY_SWJG B, Dm_Gy_Swry z where A.TBSWJG_DM=B.SWJG_DM and a.tbswjg_dm=? and a.lr_sj>=to_date(? ,'yyyy-mm-dd') and a.lr_sj<=to_date(? ,'yyyy-mm-dd') and z.swry_dm = ?

SELECT T.Swjg_Dm SWJGDM, t.swjgmc SWJGMC FROM DM_GY_SWJG T START WITH T.SWJG_DM = (select k.sjswjg_dm from DM_QX_SWRYSF a, DM_GY_SWJG k where a.swrysf_dm = ? and k.swjg_dm = a.sfswjg_dm) CONNECT BY PRIOR T.SWJG_DM = T.SJSWJG_DM and t.swjgbz = '0' and t.zn_dm = '01'
select count(1) as gs from A_GC_SSYC a where trunc(a.lr_sj)>=trunc(sysdate,'mm') and a.tbswjg_dm = ?
update A_GC_SSYC a set a.tbzt_dm='0' where a.xh=?
insert into A_GC_SSYC (xh,Tbswjg_Dm,Tbr_Dm,tbyf,Tbzt_Dm,lrry_dm,Yxbj,Lr_Sj) values(?,?,?,substr(to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),6,2),'1',?,'Y',sysdate)
INSERT INTO A_GC_SSYC_ZB (XH,MXXH,ZSXM_DM,YSBJE,QNTQ_TC_YSB_JE,YSB_YCX_JE,F_YSB_YCX_JE,QN_TSSBS_JE,CKZ_1,CKZ_2,RGQR_JE,LRRY_DM,YXBJ,LR_SJ) VALUES(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,'Y',SYSDATE)

select a.zsxm_dm, b.zsxmmc sz, a.ysbje ysb, a.qntq_tc_ysb_je qcysb, a.ysb_ycx_je ysbqyycxsy, a.f_ysb_ycx_je fysbqyycxsy, a.qn_tssbs_je qntqsbs, a.ckz_1 ycck_a, a.ckz_2 ycck_b, a.rgqr_je rgqrsbs from a_gc_ssyc_zb a, dm_gy_zsxm b where a.xh = ? and a.zsxm_dm = b.zsxm_dm order by a.xh

sql.describ: 根据当前登陆的身份查询对应的机关下拉列表

sqlfile.sql: SELECT T.Swjg_Dm SWJGDM, t.swjgmc SWJGMC FROM DM_GY_SWJG T START WITH T.SWJG_DM = (select a.sfswjg_dm from DM_QX_SWRYSF a where a.swrysf_dm = ?) CONNECT BY PRIOR T.SWJG_DM = T.SJSWJG_DM and t.swjgbz = '0' and t.zn_dm = '01'

sql.describ: 根据操作人代码取所属机关信息

sqlfile.sql: select a.sfswjg_dm swjgdm, b.swjgmc from DM_QX_SWRYSF a, dm_gy_swjg b where a.swrysf_dm = ? and a.sfswjg_dm = b.swjg_dm
select a.gzbm_dm dm,a.gzbmmc mc from DM_GZ_GZBM a where a.yxbz=? order by a.gzbm_dm

sql.describ: 根据提出部门查询规则指标种类代码表

sqlfile.sql: SELECT a.gzzl_dm id,a.gzzlmc text FROM DM_GZ_GZZL a where a.yxbz='Y' and a.gzbm_dm = ? order by a.gzzl_dm

sql.describ: 判断流程实例号能否匹配到业务数据

sqlfile.sql: select count(1) as gs from a_fz_rwfpmx a where a.lcslh=?

sql.describ: 根据流程实例号判断识别类型

sqlfile.sql: select a.sblx_dm from a_fz_rwfpmx a where a.lcslh=?

select (case when a.sblx_dm = '1' then '企业' when a.sblx_dm = '2' then '自然人' when a.sblx_dm = '3' then '建筑项目' when a.sblx_dm = '3' then '施工编码' else '错误' end) sblx, to_char(a.djxh) djxh, a.nsrmc, a.shxydm, a.nsrsbh, nvl(a.shxydm, a.nsrsbh) zsnsrsbh, c.sfzjlxmc zjlx, a.zj_hm, b.swjgmc, (case when a.gzlx_dm = '1' then '纳服应对' when a.gzlx_dm = '2' then '纳税人应对' when a.gzlx_dm = '3' then '风险事项应对' else '错误' end) gzlx, to_char(a.gzqsrq, 'yyyy-mm-dd') gzqsrq, to_char(a.gzzzrq, 'yyyy-mm-dd') gzzzrq, to_char(a.gzfq_rq, 'yyyy-mm-dd') gzfqrq, a.rewcts rwwcts, to_char(a.rwwcsx, 'yyyy-mm-dd') rwwcsx, a.sjbz, a.gzfxms, a.gz_id, a.gz_dm, d.gzzb_mc from R_GZ_SB_GZYDK_LS a, dm_gy_swjg b, DM_GY_SFZJLX c, r_gz_gzzb d where a.zgswskfj_dm = b.swjg_dm and a.zjlx_dm = c.sfzjlx_dm(+) and a.gz_dm = d.gz_dm(+) and 1 = ?

select a.nsrmc, a.nsrsbh, a.shxydm, d.swjgmc, b.fddbrxm frxm, e.sfzjlxmc frzjmc, b.fddbrsfzjhm frzjhm, c.fddbryddh frlxdh, b.zcdz, a.rwwcsx ydwcsxz, f.gzzb_mc ydsxlx, a.lczt_dm lczt,a.gzfxms,a.sfty,a.hxclfs from a_fz_rwfpmx a, dj_nsrxx b, dj_nsrxx_kz c, dm_gy_swjg d, DM_GY_SFZJLX e, R_GZ_GZZB f where a.lcslh = ? and a.djxh = b.djxh and b.djxh = c.djxh(+) and a.zgswskfj_dm = d.swjg_dm(+) and b.fddbrsfzjlx_dm = e.sfzjlx_dm(+) and a.gz_dm = f.gz_dm(+)

select a.nsrmc, a.nsrsbh, e.sfzjlxmc, a.zj_hm, d.swjgmc, a.rwwcsx ydwcsxz, f.gzzb_mc ydsxlx, a.lczt_dm lczt,a.gzfxms,a.sfty,a.hxclfs from a_fz_rwfpmx a, dm_gy_swjg d, DM_GY_SFZJLX e, R_GZ_GZZB f where a.lcslh = ? and a.zgswskfj_dm = d.swjg_dm(+) and a.zjlx_dm = e.sfzjlx_dm(+) and a.gz_dm = f.gz_dm(+)

sql.describ: 查询建筑项目基础信息

sqlfile.sql: select a.nsrmc, a.nsrsbh, a.shxydm, c.swjgmc, b.gcxmbh, b.gcxmmc, b.gcxmdz, a.rwwcsx ydwcsxz, f.gzzb_mc ydsxlx, a.lczt_dm lczt,a.gzfxms,a.sfty,a.hxclfs from a_fz_rwfpmx a, DJ_JZYGCXMQKDJXXB b, dm_gy_swjg c where a.lcslh = ? and a.sbdx_dm = b.gcxmbh(+) and a.zgswskfj_dm = c.swjg_dm(+)

sql.describ: 查询施工工程基础信息

sqlfile.sql: SELECT A.NSRMC, A.NSRSBH, A.SHXYDM, C.SWJGMC, B.Bdcxmbh, B.Bdcxmmc, B.Xmdz, A.RWWCSX YDWCSXZ, F.GZZB_MC YDSXLX, A.LCZT_DM LCZT,a.gzfxms,a.sfty,a.hxclfs from a_fz_rwfpmx a, DJ_BDCXMDJXX b, dm_gy_swjg c where a.lcslh = ? and a.sbdx_dm = b.bdcxmbh(+) and a.zgswskfj_dm = c.swjg_dm(+)

sql.describ: 根据流程实例号查询受理意见及审批意见

sqlfile.sql: select a.xh,a.sm from a_fz_gzlyj a where a.lcslh=?
select to_char(a.djxh) djxh, to_char(a.ssqq, 'yyyy-mm-dd') ssqs, to_char(a.ssqz, 'yyyy-mm-dd') ssqz, a.gzfxms ms, a.message from A_LS_FZ_WBRWFPMX a where a.zt = ? order by a.xh

select hc, uuid, xh, to_char(djxh) djxh, nsrsbm, shxydm, nvl(shxydm,nsrsbm) xsnsrsbm, nsrmc, zjlx, zjhm, swjgmc, to_char(ssqq, 'yyyy-mm-dd') ssqq, to_char(ssqz, 'yyyy-mm-dd') ssqz, gzfxms from A_LS_FZ008_query a where 1 = ? order by a.hc

sql.describ: 根据纳税人识别号或社会信用代码及操作人身份查询企业列表

sqlfile.sql: select to_char(a.djxh) djxh, a.zgswskfj_dm zgswskfjdm, b.swjgmc zgswskfjmc, a.nsrmc, a.nsrsbh, a.shxydm, a.fddbrxm, a.fddbrsfzjhm, a.zzjg_dm zzjgdm, a.nsrzt_dm nsrztdm, c.nsrztmc, a.kzztdjlx_dm kzztdjlxdm, d.kzztdjlxmc, a.kqccsztdjbz kqccsztdjbzdm, (case when a.kqccsztdjbz = 'Y' then '是' when a.kqccsztdjbz = 'N' then '否' else '' end) kqccsztdjbzmc, a.scjydz, a.zcdz from dj_nsrxx a, DM_GY_SWJG b, DM_GY_nsrzt c, dm_dj_kzztdjlx d where (a.nsrsbh = ? or a.shxydm = ?) and a.zgswskfj_dm = b.swjg_dm(+) and a.nsrzt_dm = c.nsrzt_dm(+) and a.kzztdjlx_dm = d.kzztdjlx_dm(+) and a.nsrzt_dm not in ('07', '08', '10') and a.zgswskfj_dm like (select x.znjgfw || '%' from DM_QX_SWJG_WJDS x, dm_qx_swrysf y where y.swrysf_dm = ? and y.sfswjg_dm = x.swjg_dm) order by a.zgswj_dm, a.zgswskfj_dm, a.nsrmc
select a.dlwz_dm dm, a.dlwz_mc mc from A_DM_SJFZ_DLWZ a where a.yxbj = 'Y' and 1 = ? order by a.dlwz_dm
select a.hdfs_dm dm, a.hdfs_mc mc from A_DM_SJFZ_HDFS a where a.yxbj = 'Y' and 1 = ? order by a.hdfs_dm
select a.jsyj_dm dm, a.jsyj_mc mc from A_DM_SJFZ_JSYJ a where a.yxbj = 'Y' and 1 = ? order by a.jsyj_dm
select a.jylx_dm dm, a.jylx_mc mc from a_Dm_Sjfz_JYLX a where a.yxbj = 'Y' and 1 = ? order by a.jylx_dm

sql.describ: 查询操作人身份所在机关

sqlfile.sql: select a.sfswjg_dm from dm_qx_swrysf a where a.swrysf_dm=?

sql.describ: 查询发起阶段应对人员的岗位代码

sqlfile.sql: select a.gw_dm from a_xt_swjg_gzl_gw_dzb a where a.swjg_dm = ? and a.lcdy_id = ? and a.yxbj = 'Y'

sql.describ: 根据流程实例号查询基础信息

sqlfile.sql: select uuid, zrf_djxh, zrf_zgswksdm, (select swjgmc from dm_gy_swjg where swjg_dm = srf_zgswksdm) zrf_zgswksmc, zrf_kqccsztdjbzdm, (case when zrf_kqccsztdjbzdm = 'Y' then '是' when zrf_kqccsztdjbzdm = 'N' then '否' else '' end) zrf_kqccsztdjbzmc, zrf_kzztdjlxdm, (select kzztdjlxmc from dm_dj_kzztdjlx where kzztdjlx_dm = zrf_kzztdjlxdm) zrf_kzztdjlxmc, zrf_nsrmc, zrf_nsrsbh, zrf_shxydm, zrf_frxm, zrf_frzjhm, zrf_zzjgdm, zrf_zcdz, zrf_scjydz, srf_djxh, srf_zgswksdm, (select swjgmc from dm_gy_swjg where swjg_dm = srf_zgswksdm) srf_zgswksmc, srf_kqccsztdjbzdm, (case when srf_kqccsztdjbzdm = 'Y' then '是' when srf_kqccsztdjbzdm = 'N' then '否' else '' end) srf_kqccsztdjbzmc, srf_kzztdjlxdm, (select kzztdjlxmc from dm_dj_kzztdjlx where kzztdjlx_dm = srf_kzztdjlxdm) srf_kzztdjlxmc, srf_nsrmc, srf_nsrsbh, srf_shxydm, srf_frxm, srf_frzjhm, srf_zzjgdm, srf_zcdz, srf_scjydz, qtxx_szwz, qtxx_jylx, qtxx_fcqxzhm, qtxx_tzsyzhm, qtxx_fcmj, qtxx_tdmj, qtxx_jyje, qtxx_hdfs, qtxx_hdje, qtxx_zzsyysje, qtxx_tdzzsje, qtxx_jsyj, qtxx_jsyjje, qtxx_zrfyhsje, qtxx_bjfcsje, qtxx_sfyzjfcs, qtxx_bjtdsysje, qtxx_sfyzjtdsys, qtxx_qsje, qtxx_srfyhsje, qtxx_qksm, lczt, lcslh from a_fz_fdcjysssx a where a.lcslh = ?

sql.describ: 根据流程实例号查询受理意见及审批意见

sqlfile.sql: select a.xh,a.sm from a_fz_gzlyj a where a.lcslh=?
select lcslh, zrfnsrsbh, zrfnsrmc, srfnsrsbh, srfnsrmc, szwzmc, jylxmc, fcqxzhm, tzsyzhm, scsj from a_ls_fz010_query where 1 = ? order by hc

select '（' || a.nd || '年）' || a.hm || '号' bh, a.zrfnsrsbh, a.zrfnsrmc, a.srfnsrsbh, a.srfnsrmc, e.dlwz_mc szwzmc, b.jylx_mc jylxmc, a.jyje, a.fcqxzhm, a.tzsyzhm, a.fcmj, a.tdmj, (case when a.hdfs = '03' then d.hdfs_mc || ' ' || a.hdje else d.hdfs_mc end) hdfs, nvl(a.zzsyysje, 0) zzsyysje, nvl(a.tdzzsje, 0) tdzzsje, c.jsyj_mc jsyjmc, a.jsyjje, a.zrfyhsje, a.bjfcsje, (case when a.sfyzjfcs = '1' then '是' when a.sfyzjfcs = '2' then '否' else '' end) sfyzjfcs, a.bjtdsysje, (case when a.sfyzjtdsys = '1' then '是' when a.sfyzjtdsys = '2' then '否' else '' end) sfyzjtdsys, a.qsje, a.srfyhsje, a.qksm, to_char(a.scsj,'yyyy-mm-dd') scsj from a_fz_fdcjysssx_ws a, a_Dm_Sjfz_JYLX b, A_DM_SJFZ_JSYJ c, A_DM_SJFZ_HDFS d, A_DM_SJFZ_DLWZ e where a.lcslh = ? and a.jylx = b.jylx_dm(+) and a.jsyj = c.jsyj_dm(+) and a.hdfs = d.hdfs_dm(+) and a.szwz = e.dlwz_dm(+)

sql.describ: 根据当前登陆的身份查询对应的机关下拉列表

sqlfile.sql: SELECT T.Swjg_Dm SWJGDM, t.swjgmc SWJGMC FROM DM_GY_SWJG T START WITH T.SWJG_DM = (select a.sfswjg_dm from DM_QX_SWRYSF a where a.swrysf_dm = ?) CONNECT BY PRIOR T.SWJG_DM = T.SJSWJG_DM and t.swjgbz = '0' and t.zn_dm = '01'
select a.gzbm_dm id,a.gzbmmc text from DM_GZ_GZBM a where a.yxbz=? order by a.gzbm_dm

sql.describ: 根据提出部门查询规则指标种类代码表

sqlfile.sql: SELECT a.gzzl_dm id,a.gzzlmc text FROM DM_GZ_GZZL a where a.yxbz='Y' and a.gzbm_dm = ? order by a.gzzl_dm

sql.describ: 根据提出部门、查询规则指标种类查询规则指标代码表

sqlfile.sql: select a.gz_dm id,a.gzzb_mc text from R_GZ_GZZB a where a.gzbm_dm=? and a.gzzl_dm=? and a.xy_bj='1' order by a.gz_dm

select uuid, to_char(djxh) djxh, nsrmc, nsrsbh, zgswjg_dm, zgswjg_mc, sblx_dm, sblx_mc, ydlx_dm, ydlx_mc, tcbm_dm, tcbm_mc, gzzl_dm, gzzl_mc, gzzb_dm, gzzb_mc, gzqsrq, gzzzrq, qksm from r_gz_sb_lwsj_ls a where 1 = ? order by hc

sql.describ: 根据纳税人识别号查询列表

sqlfile.sql: select djxh, swjgdm, swjgmc, nsrmc, nsrsbh, shxydm, scjydz, zcdz from (select to_char(a.djxh) djxh, a.zgswskfj_dm swjgdm, b.swjgmc swjgmc, a.nsrmc, a.nsrsbh, a.shxydm, a.scjydz, a.zcdz from dj_nsrxx a, DM_GY_SWJG b where (a.nsrsbh = ? or a.shxydm = ?) and a.zgswskfj_dm = b.swjg_dm(+) and a.nsrzt_dm not in ('07', '08', '10') and a.yxbz = 'Y' and a.zgswskfj_dm like (select x.znjgfw || '%' from DM_QX_SWJG_WJDS x, dm_qx_swrysf y where y.swrysf_dm = ? and y.sfswjg_dm = x.swjg_dm) union select to_char(a.djxh) djxh, a.slswjg_dm swjgdm, b.swjgmc swjgmc, a.xm nsrmc, a.nsrsbh, '' shxydm, '' scjydz, '' zcdz from dj_zrr a, DM_GY_SWJG b where (a.nsrsbh = ? or a.sfzjhm = ?) and a.slswjg_dm = b.swjg_dm(+) and a.sjyxzt = 'A' and a.slswjg_dm like (select x.znjgfw || '%' from DM_QX_SWJG_WJDS x, dm_qx_swrysf y where y.swrysf_dm = ? and y.sfswjg_dm = x.swjg_dm)) order by swjgdm, nsrmc

sql.describ: 根据主键获取识别类型

sqlfile.sql: select a.sblx_dm from r_gz_sb_lwsj a where a.uuid = ? and a.zf_bj='0'

sql.describ: 根据主键获取企业信息

sqlfile.sql: select a.uuid, b.nsrmc, c.swjgmc, b.nsrsbh, b.shxydm, b.scjydz, b.zcdz, a.tcbm_dm, a.gzzl_dm, a.gzzb_dm, a.qksm, to_char(a.gzqsrq, 'yyyy-mm-dd') gzqsrq, to_char(a.gzzzrq, 'yyyy-mm-dd') gzzzrq from r_gz_sb_lwsj a, dj_nsrxx b, Dm_Gy_Swjg c where a.uuid = ? and a.djxh = b.djxh and b.zgswskfj_dm = c.swjg_dm(+) and a.zf_bj = '0'

sql.describ: 根据主键获取自然人信息

sqlfile.sql: select a.uuid, b.xm nsrmc, c.swjgmc, b.nsrsbh, '' shxydm, '' scjydz, '' zcdz, a.tcbm_dm, a.gzzl_dm, a.gzzb_dm, a.qksm, to_char(a.gzqsrq, 'yyyy-mm-dd') gzqsrq, to_char(a.gzzzrq, 'yyyy-mm-dd') gzzzrq from r_gz_sb_lwsj a, dj_zrr b, Dm_Gy_Swjg c where a.uuid = ? and a.djxh = b.djxh and b.slswjg_dm = c.swjg_dm(+) and a.zf_bj = '0'

sql.describ: 根据纳税人识别号或社会信用代码及操作人身份查询企业列表

sqlfile.sql: select to_char(a.djxh) djxh, a.zgswskfj_dm zgswskfjdm, b.swjgmc zgswskfjmc, a.nsrmc, a.nsrsbh, a.shxydm, a.fddbrxm, a.fddbrsfzjhm, a.zzjg_dm zzjgdm, c.nsrztmc, d.kzztdjlxmc, (case when a.kqccsztdjbz = 'Y' then '是' when a.kqccsztdjbz = 'N' then '否' else '' end) kqccsztdjbz, a.scjydz, a.zcdz from dj_nsrxx a, DM_GY_SWJG b, DM_GY_nsrzt c, dm_dj_kzztdjlx d where (a.nsrsbh = ? or a.shxydm = ?) and a.zgswskfj_dm = b.swjg_dm(+) and a.nsrzt_dm = c.nsrzt_dm(+) and a.kzztdjlx_dm = d.kzztdjlx_dm(+) and a.nsrzt_dm not in ('07', '08', '10') and a.zgswskfj_dm like (select x.znjgfw || '%' from DM_QX_SWJG_WJDS x, dm_qx_swrysf y where y.swrysf_dm = ? and y.sfswjg_dm = x.swjg_dm) order by a.zgswj_dm, a.zgswskfj_dm, a.nsrmc
select a.sfswjg_dm swjgdm from dm_qx_swrysf a where a.swrysf_dm = ?
select to_char(a.djxh) djxh, a.nsrmc, a.nsrsbh, a.shxydm, a.frxm, a.frzjhm, a.zcdz, a.anzjzl, a.nbjtsybg, a.nclcfyj, a.qtxx, a.lczt, a.uuid from a_fz_zdfxyd a where a.lcslh = ?

select a.uuid, a.xh, a.tsrysfdm, a.tsryxm, a.ydrysfdm, a.ydryxm, a.xhsnr, a.hsjg, a.lczt, (case when a.lczt is null then '待发起' when a.lczt = '0' then '待核实' when a.lczt = '1' then '已核实' else '错误' end) lcztmc, a.lcslh from A_FZ_ZDFXYD_MX a where a.uuid = ? order by a.xh

sql.describ: 根据主键查询新的上传序号

sqlfile.sql: select nvl(max(a.xh), 0) + 1 as xh from A_FZ_SCWJ a where a.uuid = ? and a.hjdm = ?
select a.wjnr from a_fz_scwj a where a.uuid=? and a.hjdm=? and a.xh = ? for update

select a.uuid lcslh, a.hjdm, (case when a.hjdm = 'shtqinit' then '审核提请' when a.hjdm = 'rwfpinit' then '任务分配' when a.hjdm = 'hzhsinit' then '汇总情况核实' when a.hjdm = 'jzspinit' then '局长审批' when a.hjdm = 'zxinit' then '执行' when a.hjdm = 'hsinit' then '核实' else '未配置的环节' end) hjmc, a.xh, a.wjm, to_char(a.lr_sj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') scsj from a_fz_scwj a where a.uuid = ? and a.zfbj = '0' order by a.lr_sj
select a.wjm, a.wjnr from a_fz_scwj a where a.uuid = ? and a.hjdm = ? and a.xh = ?
select a.Swjgdm id, a.swjgmc text, 'closed' state, '1' lx from A_LS_comm_swjglb a where 1 = ? order by a.xh

sql.describ: 根据上级机关查询下级机关及人员

sqlfile.sql: select id, text, state, lx from (select a.swjg_dm id, a.swjgmc text, 'closed' state, '1' lx from Dm_Gy_Swjg a where a.sjswjg_dm = ? and a.xybz = 'Y' and a.yxbz = 'Y' union select a.swrysf_dm id, a.rysfmc text, '' state, '2' lx from DM_QX_SWRYSF a where a.sfswjg_dm = ? and a.yxbz = 'Y') c order by lx, id

sql.describ: 根据身份查询人员代码及机关

sqlfile.sql: select a.swry_dm swrydm,a.sfswjg_dm swjgdm from dm_qx_swrysf a where a.swrysf_dm in ?
select a.sfswjg_dm swjgdm from dm_qx_swrysf a where a.swrysf_dm = ?
select a.uuid,a.xh,a.xhsnr,a.hsjg,a.lczt,a.lcslh from a_fz_zdfxyd_mx a where a.lcslh = ?

sql.describ: 查询应对任务基本信息

sqlfile.sql: select a.nsrmc, (case when a.shxydm is not null then a.nsrsbh else a.nsrsbh end) nsrsbh, a.frxm, a.frzjhm, a.zcdz, a.anzjzl, a.nbjtsybg, a.nclcfyj, a.qtxx, a.lcslh from a_fz_zdfxyd a where a.uuid = ?
select a.xh,a.sm from a_fz_gzlyj a where a.lcslh = ?
select a.lrry_dm,a.lrjg_dm from a_fz_zdfxyd a where a.lcslh = ?
select a.csz from a_xt_xtcs a where a.csbm = ?
select a.zsxm_dm dm, a.zsxmmc mc from dm_gy_zsxm a where a.xybz = 'Y' and a.yxbz = 'Y' and a.zsxm_dm <= '10199' and 1 = ? order by a.zsxm_dm
select a.uuid,a.swjgmc,a.ygtjbbqxmc,a.sbsjq,a.sbsjz,a.lrsj,a.xgsj,a.lrry,a.xgry from a_ls_fz012_query a where 1=? order by a.hc
select a.zsxm_dm, a.zsxm_mc, a.tqycxsy_je, a.qntqsb_je, a.ycck_je, a.rgqrsb_je, a.rgqrsb_je yrgqrsb_je from a_ls_fz012_tjxx a where 1 = ? order by a.zsxm_dm
select count(1) as gs from a_fz_sssryg a where a.swjg_dm = ? and a.ygtjbbqx_dm = ? and a.sbsjq = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and a.sbsjz = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
select a.swjg_dm, a.ygtjbbqx_dm, to_char(a.sbsjq, 'yyyy-mm-dd') sbsjq, to_char(a.sbsjz, 'yyyy-mm-dd') sbsjz from a_fz_sssryg a where a.uuid = ?
select a.zsxm_dm, b.zsxmmc zsxm_mc, a.tqycxsy_je, a.qntqsb_je, a.ycck_je, a.rgqrsb_je from a_fz_sssryg_mx a, dm_gy_zsxm b where a.uuid = ? and a.zfbj = '0' and a.zsxm_dm = b.zsxm_dm(+)
select a.swry_dm,a.sfswjg_dm,a.rysfmc from dm_qx_swrysf a where a.swrysf_dm = ?
select a.url,a.lczt,a.msxx,a.fkxx from A_FZ_TS a where a.lcslh = ?
select a.tsrdm,a.tsrjg_dm from A_FZ_TS a where a.lcslh =?
select a.jbqsks_dm dm ,a.jbqsks_mc mc from a_dm_xt_jbqsks a where a.yxbj = ? order by a.jbqsks_dm
select b.swry_dm, b.swryxm, a.sfswjg_dm, to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') sj from dm_qx_swrysf a, dm_gy_swry b where a.swry_dm = b.swry_dm and a.swrysf_dm = ?
select a.uuid, a.sqrdm, a.sqrxm, a.sqrjg_dm, to_char(a.spsj, 'yyyy-mm-dd') sqsj, a.sqbm, a.bqscfs, a.xzbqqksm, a.jbnr, a.spjg, a.spyj, a.zxqkms, a.lczt, a.lcslh from a_fz_xzbqsq a where a.lcslh = ?
select a.sm from a_fz_gzlyj a where a.lcslh = ? and a.xh = '1'
select count(1) as gs from a_fz_scwj a where a.uuid = ? and a.zfbj='0'
select a.csz from a_xt_xtcs a where a.csbm = ?

select a.uuid lcslh, a.hjdm, (case when a.hjdm = 'fqinit' then '发起申请' else '未配置的环节' end) hjmc, a.xh, a.wjm, to_char(a.lr_sj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') scsj from a_fz_scwj a where a.uuid = ? and a.zfbj = '0' order by a.lr_sj

sql.describ: 根据主键查询新的上传序号

sqlfile.sql: select nvl(max(a.xh), 0) + 1 as xh from A_FZ_SCWJ a where a.uuid = ? and a.hjdm = ?

sql.describ: 根据主键查询新的上传序号

sqlfile.sql: select nvl(max(a.xh), 0) + 1 as xh from A_FZ_SCWJ a where a.uuid = ? and a.hjdm = ?
select a.wjnr from a_fz_scwj a where a.uuid=? and a.hjdm=? and a.xh = ? for update
